R

registerLayer(File) - Static method in class fractal.Layer
Used to register a new layer type
registerLayer() - Method in class menus.RegisterLayerTool
This method takes the user through a series of menus that, at the end, will locate the file containing the data for the new layer type.
RegisterLayerTool - Class in menus
This is a tool that takes the user through a series of menus to register a new layer type while the program is still running.
RegisterLayerTool() - Constructor for class menus.RegisterLayerTool
An empty constructor
removeActionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class menus.RoundedButton
Removes the specified action listener so it no longer receives action events from this button.
removeByInetAddress(InetAddress) - Method in class server.Server
 
removeJob(Job) - Method in class menus.NetworkElement
Used to remove a job from the submenu of this element
removeNetworkElement(NetworkElement) - Method in class menus.NetworkView
Used to remove a network element from the display
removeParameter(String) - Method in class util.Parameters
removes and returns a parameter
removeParameter(String, Class<E>) - Method in class util.Parameters
Similar to the removeParameter(String name) method, except it will return the parameter as a specific type removing the need to cast it afterwards.
render() - Method in class fractal.Layer
A render method that takes in a 2D array of pixels which represent the image.
render(int[][]) - Method in class fractal.RenderManager
Renders the fractal using the given 2D array of pixels.
render() - Method in class fractal.RenderManager
used to get a 2D array of pixels representing the image rendered by the layers
render(String, String) - Method in class fractal.RenderManager
Renders the fractal and saves it as an png at the designated filepath and with the designated title
renderImage(String, String, BufferedImage) - Static method in class fractal.RenderManager
A static method created to save a BufferedImage as a png to a specified location
RenderManager - Class in fractal
Manages all the layers that make up a fractal.
RenderManager() - Constructor for class fractal.RenderManager
Initializes a fractal with a black to white palette centered at tbe point 0,0.
RenderManager(Parameters) - Constructor for class fractal.RenderManager
Initializes a fractal with the given parameters
RenderManager(String) - Constructor for class fractal.RenderManager
Initializes a fractal from a file.
RenderManager(File) - Constructor for class fractal.RenderManager
Initializes a fractal from a .fractal file
renderMovie(String, double, String) - Method in class fractal.RenderManager
Makes a deep zoom of the fractal until the program is stopped
report(Diagnostic<? extends JavaFileObject>) - Method in class util.DynamicCompiler.MyDiagnosticListener
 
response(Exception) - Method in interface server.NoConnectionListener
 
RoundedButton - Class in menus
Functions as a normal JButton but it overrides the rendering code to instead be a roudned rectangle, as opposed to a rectangle with hard corners
RoundedButton() - Constructor for class menus.RoundedButton
Constructs a RoundedButton with no label.
RoundedButton(String) - Constructor for class menus.RoundedButton
Constructs a RoundedButton with the specified label.
run() - Method in class menus.Display
This contains one of the main logic loops of this class.
run() - Method in class server.SocketAdder
 
run() - Method in class server.SocketWrapper
 
running - Variable in class menus.Display
Because the Display implements Running, there needs to be some way to shut it down.
running - Variable in class server.SocketAdder
This varialbe is used to stop the thread.
running - Variable in class server.SocketWrapper
